Title: Permits licensed pharmacists to prescribe and order certain immunizations, medicines, drugs or therapeutic devices
Summary: Permits licensed pharmacists to prescribe and order certain immunizations, medicines, drugs or therapeutic devices to the extent permitted by rules and regulations promulgated by the commissioner of education and the commissioner of health.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to permitting licensed pharmacists to prescribe and order certain immunizations, medicines, drugs or therapeutic devices
